Tom Cruise

About the Role Model

☛ An American actor.

☛ One of the world's highest-paid actors, he has received various accolades, including an Honorary Palme d'Or and three Golden Globe Awards, in addition to nominations for three Academy Awards and a British Academy Film Award.

☛ Cruise, who took up acting in high school, made his film debut in Endless Love (1981).

☛ At 54, Cruise is still making millions jumping off buildings and running away from explosions.

☛ The action star and outspoken advocate for Scientology earns eight figures for films like "The Mummy" and "Mission: Impossible 6."
